instruction: Compose a song based on the provided lyrics.
input:
Lyrics:
I've been trying so hard just to make it
No one's willing to take a stand
Time is running out and I'm feeling like I'm fading
output:
Verse 1:

I've been trying so hard just to make it
No one's willing to take a stand
Time is running out and I'm feeling like I'm fading
But I won't give up, I'm gonna be brave

Chorus:

I'll keep fighting no matter what comes my way
Gonna keep pushing, no matter how hard it gets
I won't stop, I won't give in, it won't be long now
I'll stand up for what I need, I'll make a change somehow!

Verse 2: 

Gonna keep going no matter what life throws my way
Gonna keep trying, no matter the odds 
My heart won't break and I won't be defeated
I'm gonna make it somehow, I'll stand tall and proud!

Chorus: 

I'll keep fighting no matter what comes my way
Gonna keep pushing, no matter how hard it gets
I won't stop, I won't give in, it won't be long now
I'll stand up for what I need, I'll make a change somehow!
